deprecations.migration_guide: Replace 'Get Date/Time String' with 'Format Date/Time String'. The new VI provides more formatting options and better localization support.
Use the Express File I/O VIs or the native file primitives. Legacy VIs remain for backward compatibility but are not recommended for new development.
Replace old string formatting VIs with 'Format Into String' which supports modern type specifiers and better performance.
Migrate to 64-bit DLLs or use .NET assemblies. 32-bit support will be removed in LabVIEW 2026.

breaking_changes.impact: High - All 32-bit DLL calls will fail
breaking_changes.migration_path: Recompile DLLs for 64-bit or use .NET wrappers

breaking_changes.impact: Medium - Older LV versions cannot open 2025+ VIs
breaking_changes.migration_path: Save for previous version when targeting older LabVIEW
